description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Use your elemental staff to smash the incoming hordes of undead, orcs, goblins, troll and more.  Twin stick mayhem with fire, water and air spells and the fantastic spiralling lavaball.
description.short: Use your elemental staff to smash the incoming hordes of undead, orcs, goblins, troll and more.  Twin stick mayhem with fire, water and air spells and the fantastic spiralling lavaball.
